snippet.title: About
snippet.description:
About
5 Jul 2013 by kerrynitz on Fast Faust fastfaust.wordpress.com/about/
… blog is a record of a translation exercise that I have set myself. The exercise is to translate … classic, Faust, in one hour a day. The resulting translation will essentially be closer to a prose translation, as the work … no editing will be done. Hence, there are bound to be bloopers. So it goes. Understandably, the time limit also precludes looking at …
